name: necessary-extensions-pack
description: A carefully curated collection of essential Visual Studio Code extensions to boost developer productivity. Includes tools for spell checking, real-time error diagnostics, advanced Git integration, intelligent code completion with IntelliSense, path autocompletion, and code formatting for consistent and clean codebases. Perfect for developers looking to streamline their workflow with a single extension pack.

extensionPack.description: Checks spelling in code and comments to ensure error-free documentation.
Displays inline error and warning messages for quick diagnostics.
Enhances Git integration with rich visualizations and blame annotations.
Provides detailed Git commit history and branch management tools.
AI-powered code completions for smarter coding.
Customizable icons for a visually appealing workspace.
Autocompletes file paths to speed up navigation.
Formats code automatically for consistent style across projects.
